old:
うん？　覚者か
任務で来たのか？
column2:
Hm?　You're a savant or
on a mission?

old:
たまに森の獣や魔物が村のすぐ近くまで
来ることがある、十分気をつけろよ
column2:
Sometimes forest beasts and demons come
very close to the village, be very careful!

old:
われわれ白衛騎士団は、各地の衛兵として
大陸全土を守っている
column2:
We, the Knights of the White Guard, protect
the entire continent as the local guards.

old: ここはミスリウ森林の村、リンウッドだ
column2: This is the village of Linwood in Mysree Forest.

old:
森には様々な魔物がいるが
中でも多いのは森小人――
フォレストゴブリン達だ
column2:
There are many different kinds of demons in the forest,
but the most common are the forest dwarves--
forest goblins.

old:
村の北東には、やつらの群れる
《森小人の集落》がある
できるだけ近づかんようにな
column2:
To the northeast of the village, there is a "forest dwarves' village" where they are huddled

Stay away from them as much as possible!
